   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Choice Parser
=============

*Multiple-choice test parser*

**Turn PDF and plain text files with multiple choice questions into
accessible objects for catelogging in a database or common file format.**

Site Map
========

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    overview.rst
    system.rst
    router.rst
    parser.rst
